17 namespace RTSim {
18 
19  void FIFOScheduler::addTask(AbsRTTask *task) throw(RTSchedExc)
20  {
21  FIFOModel *model = new FIFOModel(task);
22 
23  if (find(task) != NULL)
24  throw RTSchedExc("Element already present");
25 
26  _tasks[task] = model;
27  }
28 
29  void FIFOScheduler::addTask(AbsRTTask* task, const std::string &p)
30  {
31  if (!dynamic_cast<AbsRTTask *>(task))
32  throw RTSchedExc("Cannot add a AbsRTTask to FIFO");
33  // ignoring parameters
34  addTask(dynamic_cast<AbsRTTask *>(task));
35  }
36 
37  FIFOScheduler * FIFOScheduler::createInstance(vector<string> &par)
38  {
39  // todo: check the parameters (i.e. to set the default
40  // time quantum)
41  return new FIFOScheduler;
42  }
43 }
